title: ScarNet: A Novel Foundation Model for Automated Myocardial Scar Quantification from LGE in Cardiac MRI
details: N Tavakoli, AA Rahsepar, BC Benefield, D Shen… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Background: Late Gadolinium Enhancement (LGE) imaging is the gold standard for assessing myocardial fibrosis and scarring, with left ventricular (LV) LGE extent predicting major adverse cardiac events (MACE). Despite its importance, routine …
